00022 #region Usings
00023 using System;
00024 using System.Text;
00025 using System.Xml;
00026 #endregion
00027 
00028 namespace Utilities.FileFormats.APMLHelper
00029 {
00033     public class APML
00034     {
00035         #region Constructors
00036 
00037 
00038 
00039         public APML()
00040         {
00041 
00042         }
00043 
00048         public APML(string Location)
00049         {
00050             XmlDocument Document = new XmlDocument();
00051             Document.Load(Location);
00052             foreach (XmlNode Children in Document.ChildNodes)
00053             {
00054                 if (Children.Name.Equals("apml", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00055                 {
00056                     foreach (XmlNode Child in Children.ChildNodes)
00057                     {
00058                         if (Child.Name.Equals("body", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00059                         {
00060                             Body = new Body((XmlElement)Child);
00061                         }
00062                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("head", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00063                         {
00064                             Head = new Head((XmlElement)Child);
00065                         }
00066                     }
00067                 }
00068             }
00069         }
00070 
00075         public APML(XmlDocument Document)
00076         {
00077             foreach (XmlNode Children in Document.ChildNodes)
00078             {
00079                 if (Children.Name.Equals("apml", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00080                 {
00081                     foreach (XmlNode Child in Children.ChildNodes)
00082                     {
00083                         if (Child.Name.Equals("body", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00084                         {
00085                             Body=new Body((XmlElement)Child);
00086                         }
00087                         else if (Child.Name.Equals("head", StringComparison.CurrentCultureIgnoreCase))
00088                         {
00089                             Head = new Head((XmlElement)Child);
00090                         }
00091                     }
00092                 }
00093             }
00094         }
00095         #endregion
00096 
00097         #region Properties
00098 
00099 
00100 
00101         public Body Body
00102         {
00103             get { return _Body; }
00104             set { _Body = value; }
00105         }
00106 
00110         public Head Head
00111         {
00112             get { return _Head; }
00113             set { _Head = value; }
00114         }
00115 
00116         private Body _Body;
00117         private Head _Head;
00118         #endregion
00119 
00120         #region Overridden Functions
00121         public override string ToString()
00122         {
00123             StringBuilder OPMLString = new StringBuilder();
00124             OPMLString.Append("<?xml version=\"1.0\"?><APML version=\"0.6\" xmlns=\"http://www.apml.org/apml-0.6\">");
00125             OPMLString.Append(Head.ToString());
00126             OPMLString.Append(Body.ToString());
00127             OPMLString.Append("</APML>");
00128             return OPMLString.ToString();
00129         }
00130         #endregion
00131     }
00132 }
